ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Re: Newbie bard race to 12
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Oh, one thing I forgot. I have been dumping training points into Bind Wound since the start and am really happy I did. At 60 or so it heals up to 15 over
ygData.messageBody:
> switching to my mandolin and healing in between battles.


Oh, one thing I forgot. I have been dumping training points into Bind Wound
since the start and am really happy I did. At 60 or so it heals up to 15
over (I think) 3 ticks and really makes the first half of bad hurtin heal
quickly. When the fight ends I start Hymn, arm the mandolin, and start
bandaging. As the standing penalty is only 2/tick it's a pretty good
tradeoff. Also, a small oddity, while Hymn won't work, it turns out you can
bandage PvP+ players.

Tsengu


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
